articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Fishery Station of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Fishery Station of KPA
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, gave field guidance to Fishery Station No. 18 under KPA Unit 567 which is making big fish hauls.
					 He shook hands with leading officials of the station one by one, saying he came to it, informed of its unprecedented big fish hauls, and he was pleased to have formed relations with the fishery station taking the lead in carrying out the party's fishery policy and appreciating the lot of efforts made by them.
					
					 "There hangs a strong smell of fishes in the compound of the station," he said, adding: "This is the precious fruition of feelings of loyalty of the officials and employees of the station to the party as they share the will and intention with the supreme commander to provide the servicepersons with fish everyday."
					
					 Watching the fishes piling up on the landing place, he said: "How pleased President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il would have been if they had seen this fantastic scenery. The big fish hauls make me think of their devoted services to the country and people."
					
					 It is our noble duty to thoroughly carry out the last instructions of the President and Kim Jong Il who worked heart and soul to turn the mountains and fields of the country into golden mountains and fields all their lives and, at the same time, make big fish hauls in the seas of the socialist homeland."
					
					 Noting that this year is a year when the history of big fish hauls began, he stressed that the People's Army is the pace-setters in creating this history.
					
					 He got aboard the boat Tanphung 2-04 which anchored at the wharf, flying the flag of big fish hauls.
					
					 Watching the hold full of fishes, he said with great pleasure that he felt relieved in a moment of the fatigue pent up in the year and it is just like words of a song which says whistles of big fish hauls are coming to the wharf while holds are full of fishes.
					
					 "Being informed that the fishery field of the People's Army is making big fish hauls, I am so pleased that I find it hard to get asleep these days. How pleased the parents of the service personnel at the posts defending the country are to hear this news as I am so glad to hear about the big fish hauls", he said.
					
					 Hearing with satisfaction officials say fishes caught by this fishery station are being regularly supplied to every post of the forefront units and service personnel like them very much, he noted he was most delighted to receive such report.
					
					 Going round the freezing and salting stores full of fishes, he praised the employees for striving hard to send all fishes to soldiers. He emphasized that they could send fresh fishes to them only through proper freezing and storing.
					
					 Learning that the women working in the fish processing shop are family members of the fishermen, he praised them for turning out as one in the drive for implementing the party's fishery policy. He added that the employees of the station and their families are all faithful implementers of the party's fishery policy and patriots.
					
					 Pointing out that the Fishery Station No. 18 of KPA Unit 567 is a typical unit in the drive for implementing the ideas of the party and upholding its policy, he underscored the need for the whole country including the civilian fisheries to earnestly follow its example.
					
					 The fisheries have an important role to play for improving the people's living standard and it is the reserve for solving the problem of food to make a more effective use of the seas, he said, underlining the need to bolster up the fisheries at any cost.
					
					 Saying that an important guarantee for making big fish hauls lies in putting the fisheries on a scientific and modern basis through the positive application of cutting-edge science and technology and advanced fishing methods, he emphasized the need for the fisheries to intensify the drive for breaking through the cutting-edge science and technology like other fields of the national economy.
					
					 He said that it is necessary to conduct a scientific and technological search for fishing grounds in conformity with the ever-changing fishing conditions and seasons, quickly occupy main fishing grounds  and net more fishes through intensive fishing operations and thus honor without fail the fishing plan for this year set forth by the party.
					
					 He called for channeling big efforts into the supply service for fishermen in order to provide them with good living conditions including labor protection goods, food, essential foodstuff, non-staple food and fuel and thus let them fulfill their duty in a responsible manner free from any worries while conducting fishing operations in the pelagic sea.
					
					 He spared time to watch a performance given by members of the art group of the station at its cultural hall.
					
					 He praised members of the art group for staging a splendid performance high in its ideological and artistic values as it dealt with the feelings of the employees who are faithful followers, defenders and implementers of the party's fishery policy.
					
					 He gave thanks of the supreme commander of the KPA to the station for fully displaying the indomitable mental power to carry out the party's order at any cost irrespective of rain or shine. Then he had a photo session with the employees and their families.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, So Hong Chan, Yun Tong Hyon, Ri Pyong Chol, Pak Jong Chon, Kim Yang Gon, O Il Jong, Han Kwang Sang, Pak Myong Chol, Ri Jae Il and Kim Yo Jong.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Meets Russian President
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Meets Russian President 
 Moscow, November 18 (KCNA Correspondent) -- Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president of the Russian Federation, at the Grand Kremlin Palace on Tuesday. Choe is on a visit to Russia as a special envoy of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					Choe Ryong Hae conveyed greeting of Kim Jong Un to Putin.
					
					 Putin expressed deep thanks for this and asked Choe to convey his warm greeting.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae courteously conveyed the personal letter of Kim Jong Un to Putin.
					
					 Putin expressed deep thanks to Kim Jong Un for sending his personal letter.
					
					 Recollecting with deep emotion his several meetings with leader Kim Jong Il, Putin said that Russia and the DPRK are close neighbors and have long-standing tradition of friendship and cooperation.
					
					 He expressed his sincere hope that everything would go well in the DPRK. It is important to positively explore the ways of boosting mutually beneficial cooperation between the two countries, he added.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae talked about expanding and developing the bilateral friendly and cooperative relations onto a higher stage in the significant year, 2015. 
					
					 Present there were Kim Kye Gwan, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, No Kwang Chol, vice-chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army, Kim Hyong Jun, DPRK ambassador to Russia, and Yuri Ushakov, aide to the president, and Igor Morgulov, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs.

articles.title: DPRK Delegate Categorically Rejects "Draft Resolution" against DPRK
articles.content:
DPRK Delegate Categorically Rejects "Draft Resolution" against DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegate categorically rejected the "draft resolution" (A/C.3/69/L.28.Rev.1) in its entirety submitted by the European Union and Japan at the meeting of the Third Committee of the 69th UN General Assembly held in New York on Nov. 18.
					 In a statement before vote he said:
					
					 The "draft resolution" constitutes a product of political and military confrontation and plot against the DPRK and has no relevance with genuine promotion and protection of human rights.
					
					 By taking sides with the United States hostile policy against the DPRK, the European Union and Japan fabricated and submitted the "draft resolution" based on the "report of the Commission of Inquiry" on the human rights situation of the DPRK, which has never been to the country at all.
					
					 We wish to make it clear once again that the "report of the Commission of Inquiry" referred to in the "draft resolution" is only based on the fabricated "testimonies" of such a handful of "defectors" as unable to specify the numbers, who committed crimes and fled the country abandoning even their beloved ones including their parents, brothers and sisters alike. As such, the "report" is no more than a compilation full of groundless political accusations and contradictions and has no qualification and credibility to be recognized as an official document of the United Nations.
					
					 We have consistently maintained a position of rejecting confrontation and giving priority to dialogue and cooperation in the area of human rights and, from this perspective, clearly stated our renewed intention this time around to engage in broad-ranging constructive cooperation.
					
					 Unfortunately, however, the European Union and Japan chose to provoke   confrontation by trying to enforce the adoption of the "draft resolution" which fails to reflect the reality on the ground and only pursues political objectives through manipulation of other countries with coerciveness and political and economic pressure. 
					
					 Moreover, some member states of the European Union and Japan hastily included in the "draft resolution" such dirty materials as despicable leaflets flown by a few "defectors" along the military demarcation line on the Korean peninsula, thus blocking by themselves the opportunity for relevant UN personnel concerned to visit the DPRK and see the reality. 
					
					 We do not feel any necessity to appeal to anyone to come and see the reality of our country where politics and social system are all for the people and guarantee their human rights.
					
					 This time, the European Union and Japan again disclosed by themselves that their human rights effort so far was not for genuine promotion and protection of human rights but simply for subservience and sycophancy to the US hostile policy towards the DPRK from the outset, thus closing the door to human rights dialogue as well as all dialogues including political dialogue.
					
					 We are seriously desirous of dialogue and cooperation for genuine promotion and protection of human rights. However, we shall strongly respond without slightest tolerance to any attempts on the part of hostile forces to abuse human rights issue as a tool for overthrowing the social system of our country. 
					
					 The outrageous and unreasonable human rights campaign staged by the United States and its followers in their attempts to eliminate the state and social system of the DPRK is compelling us not to refrain any further from conducting nuclear test.
					
					 In a statement after vote the DPRK delegation said:
					
					 My delegation once again categorically rejects the "resolution".
					
					 The enforced adoption of the "resolution" clearly shows that there is no further need for human rights dialogue with the European Union.
					
					 It also proves that the so-called "human rights dialogue" advocated by the European Union is only intended to pursue sinister political purposes of eliminating the ideology and social system of the DPRK. 
					
					 No matter what, we shall continue to move forward in the direction of our choice. 
					
					 In light of ever more unscrupulous human rights campaign undertaken by the hostile forces against the DPRK, we shall keep in our hearts the pride and honor about the socialist system which was chosen and is being consolidated and developed by our people and do our utmost to defend it.

articles.title: Senior State Officials Visit February 20 Factory of KPA
articles.content:
Senior State Officials Visit February 20 Factory of KPA
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju and other senior state officials and officials of the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited the February 20 Factory of the Korean People's Army on Wednesday.
					 The factory built as a center conducive to improving the diet of service personnel has turned into a model and standard of the Korean foodstuff factories.
					
					 The officials laid bouquets before the mosaic portraying smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Being briefed on the history of the factory, they went round various places along the course of the field guidance provided by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Touring the production control room, combined processing shop, essential foodstuff shop, butter shop, packing paper shop and other places, they keenly realized the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un who led the updating of the factory as required by the age of the knowledge-based economy by relying on the indigenous force and technology.
					
					 They expressed admiration at the modern factory, the model factory in the era of the Workers' Party in which all its production processes have been put on an automated, unmanned, germ-free and dust-free basis and its cultured practice in production and life has been established at a high level.
					
					 On the same day they watched a performance given by members of the art group of the factory.

articles.title: King of Bahrain Hopes for Development of Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
King of Bahrain Hopes for Development of Relations with DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- Hamad Bin Isa al-Khalifa, king of Bahrain, hopes that durable peace would settle on the Korean Peninsula and Korea be reunified in the interests of the Korean people. He said this when receiving credentials from DPRK Ambassador to his country So Chang Sik on Nov. 11.
					 He wished supreme leader Kim Jong Un good health and greater success in leading the Korean people in their drive for progress and prosperity.
					
					 He hoped that the bilateral relations would develop in different fields in a multilateral way.

articles.title: Scientific and Technological Presentation in Field of Land and Environment Protection Held
articles.content:
Scientific and Technological Presentation in Field of Land and Environment Protection Held
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- A national scientific and technological presentation in the field of land and environment protection took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday to mark the 50th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's work "On Strengthening Land Management" and the 30th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Improving and Strengthening Land Administration".
					 Present there were officials concerned, and scientists, technicians and teachers in the field of land management and environment protection.
					
					 Jong Yong Nam, vice-chairman of the C.C., the Nature Conservation Union of Korea, made an opening address.
					
					 He said that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il paid deep attention to the land management all their lives and worked heart and soul to give face-lifting to the mountains and rivers of the country.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un published the work "On Effecting a Drastic Turn in Land Management to Meet the Requirements for Building a Thriving Socialist Nation", providing important guidelines for turning the country into a thriving socialist nation and the people's paradise, he noted.
					
					 He called upon all scientists and technicians to give full play to Kim Jong Il's patriotism, successfully settle the scientific and technological issues arising in the land management and environment protection and thus positively contribute to building an economic power and highly civilized nation and improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 The participants heard dozens of papers for settling scientific and technological issues arising in turning the whole country into thick woodland, greenery and orchards, putting land protection, afforestation, road and river and stream improvement on a scientific and modern basis and preventing the pollution of air and contamination of  water.

articles.title: Ancient Building in Pyongyang Draws Foreign Painters
articles.content:
Ancient Building in Pyongyang Draws Foreign Painters
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- Korea has a long history of decorative colorful painting for buildings. This history began with use of mineral paints to prevent the wooden structures from being decayed.
					 Typical of its ancient buildings painted red and blue is Ryongwang Pavilion in Central District, Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK.
					
					 The pavilion has fantastic and graceful decorations. It is decorated with series of lotus flower and cloud patterns, which are clear in line and contrast and bright in color.
					
					 Such red-and-blue patterns have drawn watercolor painters of different countries for their peculiarities.

articles.title: New Mobile Detector Developed
articles.content:
New Mobile Detector Developed
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the Physics Institute under the State Academy of Sciences of the DPRK have recently developed a new mobile detector to find gas cavities, cracks and impurities in steel products and castings.
					 The detector should be connected to laptop when testing products at the point of production. It is simple in structure but very effective in raising the quality of products.
					
					 It has been already applied to different production units of the country, proving highly efficient.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Earmarking Huge Amount of Fund for Leaflet-scattering Operation
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Earmarking Huge Amount of Fund for Leaflet-scattering Operation
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- A lawmaker from an opposition party of south Korea recently disclosed the information he received from the puppet Defense Agency.
					 According to the information, 1,835 million  won has been earmarked for developing 155 mm shells for scattering leaflets in the Defence Agency's draft budget for next year.
					
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 Not content with back-stage wire-pulling of human scum in the reckless leaflet-scattering operations, the south Korean puppet regime itself is caught red-handed while spearheading them, a disclosure of its despicable true colors.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that a spokesman for the puppet Defense Ministry made clumsy excuses, claiming such shells are not meant for using in peace time, the army, too, may carry out a leaflet-scattering operation, and it is hard to disclose details.
					
					 However, such poor excuses only bring to light the regime's true colors as an arch criminal who perpetrated the leaflet-scattering operations in an organized manner and its shameless nature.
					
					 The above-said information fully revealed its ulterior intention to bedevil the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The puppet regime should bear in mind that there will be neither dialogue nor improvement of the relations between the north and the south as long as such leaflet scattering operations go on.
					
					 If the regime persists in its act of deliberately rattling the nerves of the DPRK, it will only precipitate its self-destruction.

articles.title: Korean in Germany Slams S. Korean Authorities' Treachery
articles.content:
Korean in Germany Slams S. Korean Authorities' Treachery
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- Korean in Germany Ri Jun Sik made public an article on Nov. 7 blasting the south Korean puppet authorities for their flunkeyism and treachery. 
					 The article accused the south Korean authorities for giving up military sovereignty by indefinitely extending the transfer of the right to the wartime operation control. 
					
					 Recalling that media on Nov. 5 disclosed the south Korean authorities' plan to suspend the installing of facilities on Tok Islets, the article went on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities told the U.S. they would not take over the military sovereignty which means the life and security of the nation, while giving up territorial sovereignty, reading the face of Japan. These acts of treachery being committed by the present regime are lashing all Koreans into fury. The traitors should step down themselves as they spearheaded such submission.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Germany
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- A committee for honoring the memory of leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Germany on Nov. 15.
					 Torsten Schoevitz, chairman of the Communist Party of Germany, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events to praise the undying feats of Kim Jong Il from Nov. 16 to Dec. 17.

articles.title: Socialism Is Sure to Triumph: Russian Party
articles.content:
Socialism Is Sure to Triumph: Russian Party
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- The Maritime Territorial Regional Committee for the Communist Party of the Russian Federation issued a statement on Nov. 11 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science."
					 The statement said:
					
					 The work evoked lively response among world people right after its publication.
					
					 The book authored by the great man was just like a fresh air as we were almost choked in face of criticism by imperialists and renegades of socialism who talked about the "end of socialism" by taking the advantage of a series of collapse of socialism in various countries.
					
					 The preceding socialist theory that attached importance to material and economic factors only could hardly escape historical limitations.
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung founded the man-centered Juche idea, the first of its kind in history, and built Korean-style socialism which thoroughly embodied it.
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il who personified the idea and traits of the President further developed in depth the Juche idea and the idea and theory of socialist construction, clearly indicating the road to be followed by the working people.
					
					 Socialism in the DPRK is solid and it has dynamically advanced toward the final victory despite nuclear threat, blockade and economic sanctions by the imperialists.
					
					 Socialism centered on the popular masses is the most scientific, advantageous and powerful one.
					
					 It is sure to triumph for its scientific accuracy and truth.

articles.title: Austrian Organization Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Saber-rattling
articles.content:
Austrian Organization Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Saber-rattling
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity Committee of Unionists for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in Austria made public a statement on Nov. 12 in denunciation of the south Korean authorities' reckless war exercises against the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We heard with great indignation the news that the Hoguk exercises are being staged on the Korean Peninsula on the largest-ever scale, increasing the danger of a war.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' undisguised war exercises against their fellow countrymen cannot but be a reckless act.
					
					 We urge them to stop at once the Hoguk exercises.
					
					 We demand the U.S. have sincere talks with the DPRK for the conclusion of a peace agreement and the south Korean authorities make efforts for mending the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 We urge the south Korean authorities to abolish the fascist "Security Law", immediately set free the patriotic personages detained for their struggle for the development of north-south relations and peace and reunification, and ensure the rights of the south Korean trade unions.

articles.title: Brazilian Political Figure Discloses US Anti-DPRK Human Rights Racket
articles.content:
Brazilian Political Figure Discloses US Anti-DPRK Human Rights Racket
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- Rosanita Campos, vice-chairman of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, on Nov. 6 dedicated an article titled "False propaganda by U.S. monopolistic paid media" to the paper Hora do Povo to disclose the U.S. human rights campaign against the DPRK.
					 The article said:
					
					 The U.S. paid trumpeters are committing provocations against the DPRK over "human rights issue."
					
					 They are staging campaigns against the countries refusing to follow the U.S. doctrine, the governments with way of thinking different from it and socialism.
					
					 Those who have independent thinking are well aware that the U.S. is the world's worst human rights abuser and it is perpetrating hostile acts against socialist Korea by abusing the name of the international community in a bid to realize its strategy for dominating the Asia-Pacific.
					
					 The U.S. needed falsity and fraud to attain its goal.
					
					 It is loudly advertising the Western-style view on value which paralyses normal thinking of people through media while financing plot-breeding organs to tarnish the image of the DPRK through "human rights" racket against it.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Nigerian Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Nigerian Organizations
 Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy, Group for the Study of the Songun Politics and the Group for Self-Reliance Studies released a joint statement on Nov. 12 on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il firmly consolidated the political and ideological position of the DPRK.
					
					 He, who put forward the Korean People's Army as a pillar for accomplishing the socialist cause and driving force of the revolution, paid deep attention to bolstering up the political forces of the Korean society with the KPA as its core.
					
					 He made sure that the popular masses were rallied around the Workers' Party of Korea with his politics of love and trust and turned all service personnel and people into an integral whole of single-minded unity which shares destiny with the party.
					
					 It is the brilliant fruition of Kim Jong Il's wise leadership that the DPRK has demonstrated its dignity as a politico-ideological power which remains unfazed in any storm and stress by dint of its single-minded unity of the whole society stronger than nukes.
					
					  He ushered in a new era of building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Although he passed away, his cause of Songun and the cause of building a thriving socialist nation have been successfully carried forward.
					
					 We express expectation and conviction that only victory and glory will be in store for the Korean people who are dynamically advancing toward a final victory under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, true to the behests of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige Empresa Pesquera no. 18 adscrita a Unidad 567 de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige Empresa Pesquera no. 18 adscrita a Unidad 567 de EPC
Pyongyang, 19 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Empresa Pesquera no. 18, adscrita a la unidad 567 del EPC.
					Al llegar a la empresa, el Mariscal tomo uno tras otro las manos de los funcionarios de la empresa diciendo que  el mismo la visito al informarse de que la empresa captura gran cantidad de peces y les trasmitio el saludo cordial evaluando con satisfaccion los meritos de esta unidad que toma delantera en el cumplimento de la politica pesquera del Partido.
					
					En el recinto de la empresa huele a pescados, lo cual deviene el testimonio de la fidelidad de los funcionarios y empleados de la empresa quienes comparten el alma y el proposito con el Comandante Supremo quien quiere suministrarlos cada dia a los militares, senalo.
					
					Presenciando la cascada de pescados en el campo de desembarcadero, el Mariscal dijo que si el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il lo hubieran visto, habrian sentido mucha alegria y recordo con emocion la abnegacion de ellos dedicada por la patria y el pueblo.
					
					Enriquecer el mar de la patria socialista es nuestra obligacion orientada a cumplir cabalmente los legados del Presidente y el Dirigente quienes se esforzaron tanto en todas sus vidas por enriquecer los montes y campos patrios, subrayo.
					
					Anadio que 2014 es el ano en que se inicio en el pais la oleada de captura de muchos peces y elogio al EPC como precursor de la creacion de esta historia para enriquecer el mar.
					
					El Mariscal subio al barco pesquero "Tanphung2-04" que entro al muelle flameando la banderita de gran pesca.
					
					Mirando el monton de pescados en la bodega, dijo con amplia sonrisa que se sentia bien y le parecia desaparecer en el acto la fatiga acumulada durante un ano.
					
					Desde que he recibido el parte de abundantes capturas en el sector pesquero del EPC, me siento tan feliz que no puedo conciliar el sueno por la noche, dijo y agrego que se pondrian mas contentos los padres que enviaron a sus hijos a los puestos de defensa de la patria.
					
					Tras escuchar satisfecho el parte de los funcionarios de que la empresa suministra normalmente los pescados a las unidades en la primera linea del frente y los militares los consumen con mucho gusto, el Mariscal dijo que el se pone mas feliz cuando recibe tales partes.
					
					Recorriendo el deposito de refrigeracion y el almacen de saladura donde se guardan en montones los pescados, reconocio los esfuerzos de los empleados por enviar a los militares hasta el ultimo pescado capturado y destaco la necesidad de conservar y almacenar bien los pescados para suministrarlos en fresco a los militares.
					
					Informado de que las mujeres que trabajan en el taller de elaboracion de pescados son las familiares de los pesqueros, dijo que todos los empleados y sus familiares son patriotas y ejecutores consecuentes de la politica del partido sobre la pesqueria.
					
					Elogio la empresa como unidad ejemplar de la campana para cumplir y defender la ideologia y politica del partido e instruyo que todo el pais, sobre todo, las unidades pesqueras civiles deben aprender el ejemplo de la empresa.
					
					La rama pesquera ocupa posicion importante en la mejora de las condiciones de vida del pueblo y la clave para resolver el problema alimentario esta en explotar con mas eficiencia el mar, dijo y subrayo que se debe dinamizar la rama a todo trance.
					
					Para capturar muchos peces, es necesario introducir activamente las ciencias y tecnicas sofisticadas y avanzados metodos pesqueros, senalo y apunto que la rama pesquera, al igual que otros sectores de la economia nacional, debe levantar la oleada de conquista de ciencias sofisticadas.
					
					Prosiguio que hace falta realizar de manera cientifica y tecnica la busqueda de peces conforme a las condiciones que se cambian a menudo y a la estacion de captura y librar la intensa campana de recogida de peces en las zonas pesqueras principales, de modo que se cumpla sin falta el plan de captura de peces presentado este ano por el partido.
					
					Subrayo la necesidad de prestar mucha atencion al abastecimiento a los pesqueros de los materiales de proteccion laboral, provisiones, alimentos basicos y subsidiarios, combustible, etc. para que ellos cumplan con responsabilidad sus tareas sin preocupacion alguna.
					
					En la casa de cultura, el Mariscal presencio una funcion ofrecida por los miembros del grupo artistico de la empresa.
					
					Evaluo de excelente la funcion diciendo que los miembros del grupo artistico la ofrecieron con alto nivel ideologico y artistico reflejando el alma de los empleados que son adeptos, defensores y ejecutores consecuentes de la politica del partido.
					
					En nombre del Comandante Supremo del EPC, expreso agradecimiento a la empresa que trabaja con toda su potencial espiritual para cumplir la orden dada por el partido en cualesquier condiciones del tiempo, y se fotografio junto a los empleados y sus familiares.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Hwang Pyong So, So Hong Chan, Yun Tong Hyon, Ri Pyong Chol, Pak Jong Chon, Kim Yang Gon, O Il Jong, Han Kwang Sang, Pak Myong Chol, Ri Jae Il y Kim Yo Jong.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae se reune con Putin
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae se reune con Putin
Moscu, 18 de noviembre (Corresponsal de ACNC) -- El miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, quien realiza una visita a ese pais en calidad de enviado especial del Mariscal Kim Jong Un se reunio el dia 18 en el Gran Palacio de Kremlin con el presidente de la Federacion Rusa, Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin.
					 El enviado especial traslado el saludo que envia el Mariscal Kim Jong Un al mandatario ruso.
					
					 Putin expreso agradecimiento y encomendo al visitante que extendiera su saludo cordial a Kim Jong Un.
					
					Cuando recibio la carta personal enviada por el Mariscal, el presidente ruso volvio a expresar agradecimiento profundo.
					
					 Al recordar con profunda emocion los encuentros con el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, dijo que Rusia y Corea son vecinos cercanos y tienen larga tradicion de amistad y cooperacion.
					
					 Deseo de todo corazon que todo marche bien en la RPDC y subrayo que es importante buscar los remedios para desarrollar mas la colaboracion de beneficio mutuo entre los dos paises.
					
					  Choe Ryong Hae se refirio a que en el proximo ano significativo, deben ser ampliadas y desarrolladas en el nivel mas alto las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea y Rusia.
					
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes, por la parte coreana, el primer viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Kim Kye Gwan, el subjefe del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, No Kwang Chol, y el embajador coreano en Rusia, Kim Hyong Jun y por la rusa, el asistente del presidente, Yuri Ushakov y el vicecanciller Igor Morgulov.

articles.title: Delegado coreano rechaza "proyecto de resolucion" anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Delegado coreano rechaza "proyecto de resolucion" anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 19 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En la reunion del 3o comite del 69o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU sesionada el dia 18 en Nueva York, el delegado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea rechazo categoricamente el "proyecto de resolucion" sobre la "situacion de DDHH de la RPDC" (A/C.3/69/L.28.Rev.1), presentado por la UE y Japon.
					El senalo que el "proyecto de resolucion" es un producto de la confrontacion politica y militar y el complot contra la RPDC y no tiene nada que ver con la promocion y el fomento genuino de DDHH, y continuo:
					
					Tomando parte de la politica hostil de EE.UU. contra la RPDC, la UE y Japon elaboraron y presentaron el "proyecto" a base del "reporte" de la "Comision de Investigacion" sobre el estado de DDHH de la RPDC que no la ha visitado siquiera.
					
					Queremos dejar en claro una vez mas que el "reporte de la Comision de Investigacion",incluido en el "proyecto de resolucion", es basado en los fabricados "testimonios" de un punado de "fugitivos norcoreanos", cuyo numero no se ha especificado, quienes cometieron crimenes y huyeron del pais abandonando hasta a sus seres queridos como padres y hermanos. Por lo tanto, el "reporte" no es mas que una compilacion llena de acusaciones politicas infundadas y contradicciones y no tiene calificacion ni credibilidad para ser reconocido como documento oficial de la ONU.
					
					La RPDC mantiene constantemente la posicion de rechazar en la rama de derechos humanos internacionales la confrontacion y dar importancia al dialogo y la cooperacion y a partir de esta perspectiva, expusimos esta vez nuestra renovada intencion de recurrir a la cooperacion amplia y constructiva.
					
					Desafortunadamente, la Union Europea y Japon optaron por provocar la confrontacion tratando de aprobar forzadamente el "proyecto de resolucion" que no refleja correctamente la realidad y persigue unicamente los objetivos politicos mediante la manipulacion a otros paises con coercion y presion  politica y economica. 
					
					Ademas, algunos paises miembros de la UE y Japon incluyeron en su "proyecto de resolucion" sin ninguna verificacion los materiales malsanos como volantes sucios que algunos desertores norcoreanos lanzan desde la linea de demarcacion militar de la Peninsula Coreana y asi ellos mismos echaron a perder la oportunidad de que los delegados correspondientes de la ONU visiten a la RPDC para ver la verdad.
					
					No tenemos la necesidad de pedir a alguien que visite para ver la realidad de nuestro pais donde la politica y el regimen son totalmente para las masas populares y garantiza sus derechos humanos.
					
					Esta vez, la UE y Japon revelaron por si mismos que sus esfuerzos por los DDHH distan mucho de la promocion y mejoramiento genuino de DDHH y fueron un acto de sumision a la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
					
					Asimismo, ellos cerraron con su mano la puerta del dialogo sobre los DDHH y los otros politicos.
					
					Aunque la RPDC desea el dialogo y la cooperacion por la promocion y el fomento de verdaderos DDHH, no perdonara el intento de las fuerzas hostiles de usar este tema como espacio para derrocar nuestro regimen y le enfrentaremos rotundamente.
					
					Detras del "proyecto de resolucion" auspiciado por la UE y Japon, hay la politica hostil contra la RPDC practicada por EE.UU., que tiene el intento de eliminar con las fuerzas el sistema social de nuestro pais.
					
					En particular, nos vemos a tomar en serio el hecho de que EE.UU. instigo a sus satelites a acusarnos de los "crimenes de lesa humanidad" en el "proyecto de resolucion".
					
					Los pueblos del mundo recuerdan frescamente todavia que EE.UU. desato la Guerra contra Yugoslavia en la decada de 1990 bajo el pretexto de la "intervencion humanitaria" que reclama la prevencion de crimenes de lesa humanidad.
					
					Ahora se hizo mas claro que todos los tipos de ejercicios militares y entrenamientos de ataque nuclear de caracter agresivo realizados en los ultimos anos en el Sur de Corea y sus periferias en una envergadura sin precedentes son relacionados con la viciosa campana de DDHH liderada por la UE y Japon.
					
					La realidad nos indica la necesidad de mantener el gran poderio nacional para defender los DDHH de nuestro pueblo.
					
					La brutal e irracional campana de DDHH, lanzada por EE.UU. y sus seguidores en su intento de eliminar el Estado y el sistema social de la RPDC, nos obliga a no abstenerse de la futura prueba nuclear.
					
					Los auspiciantes y los partidarios del "proyecto de resolucion" seran responsables por todas las consecuencias, ya que ellos mismos rompieron la oportunidad y las condiciones de cooperacion para los DDHH.
					
					La adopcion forzada del "proyecto de resolucion" demuestra claramente que no hay ya la necesidad del dialogo de DDHH con la UE. 
					
					Esos comprueba ademas que el llamado "dialogo de DDHH" abogado por  la UE es encaminado a alcanzar los siniestros objetivos politicos de eliminar la ideologia y el sistema social de la RPDC.
					
					Digan lo que digan otros, continuaremos marchando adelante en la direccion que hemos optado. 
					
					Aunque se torne mas brutal la inescrupulosa campana de DDHH lanzada por las fuerzas hostiles contra la RPDC, guardaremos en nuestros corazones el orgullo y el honor del sistema socialista que fue escogido, consolidado y desarrollado por nuestro pueblo y haremos todo lo posible por defenderlo.

articles.title: Levantadas estatuas de bronce de Generalisimos en Universidad de Seguridad
articles.content:
Levantadas estatuas de bronce de Generalisimos en Universidad de Seguridad
Pyongyang, 19 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 18 la ceremonia de develado de las estatuas de bronce de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en la Universidad de Seguridad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Participaron en la ocasion Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Pak To Chun, Kim Won Hong, Jo Yon Jun, los miembros de mando del Ministerio de Seguridad Estatal, los funcionarios de los organos de seguridad a todos niveles, los funcionarios, profesores, empleados y cadetes del plantel docente, y sus familiares, los funcionarios y ameritados de las unidades que hicieron aporte al levantamiento de las estatuas de bronce.
					
					Los cuadros directivos del partido y el ejercito y los cuadros del citado plantel quitaron el velo de las estatuas de bronce.
					
					Al pie de las estatuas fue colocado un cesto de flores a nombre del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Seguidamente, quedaron colocados un cesto de flores a nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC, y los otros a nombre del Ministerio de Seguridad Estatal y los organos de seguridad y otras unidades a todos niveles. 
					
					Todos los participantes en el acto rindieron homenaje a los Generalisimos. 
					
					El discurso de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Kim Won Hong, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y ministro de Seguridad Estatal. 
					
					El orador dijo que el levantamiento de las estatuas de bronce es un acontecimiento y gran jubilo revolucionario para manifestar la conviccion y voluntad de todos los militares y civiles coreanos de llevar a feliz termino la causa del Paektu dando firme continuidad al linaje del Juche y para continuar la historia de la causa de eternidad de lider. 
					
					Destaco que el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, fundadores y constructores de organos de seguridad de tipo jucheano, dieron inicio a la construccion de organo de seguridad de caracter mas popular y autoctono y condujeron sabiamente las labores para la seguridad estatal.
					
					El Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Kim Jong Un, continua y desarrolla la autoctona idea en materia de seguridad y las proezas de direccion de los Generalisimos y dispensa grandes benevolencias a los funcionarios de seguridad estatal para que cumplieran su honrosa mision en la ofensiva general para lograr la victoria final de la revolucion del Songun, apunto el orador. 
					
					Llamo a todos los funcionarios de seguridad estatal, los profesores, empleados y cadetes de la Academia Militar de Seguridad a realizar la construccion de organos de seguridad y sus actividades a la manera de los Generalisimos guardando la conviccion de que estos viven para siempre en nosotros y cumplir con la sagrada mision y deber como defensores del lider y del Comandante Supremo.
					
					Los participantes pasaron revista a las estatuas tras escuchar explicaciones correspondientes.
